main.name: Kuei-Chin Huang
main.description: Passionate for web programming. Highly-motivated and self-driven individual. Expert with multiple front-end and back-end technologies.
main.bio: Challenges are fascinating and inspiring. It's also one of the reasons why I love programming. I enjoy the process of becoming better at what I love. I know I'll eventually get the goals if I try hard and train hard every day. In the meantime, I hope all the skills I learned can not only benefit myself but also help other people to reach their goals.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

education.degree: Master in Social and Regional Development

work.title: DevOps Analyst
work.description: Automated the process of generating a Portfolio Pipeline Report by coding M language in Power BI which improved work efficiency with a 70% reduction in time.

work.title: Data Loss Prevention Analyst
work.description: Developed Macro and VBA scripts that reduced the time required to generate Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Service Level Agreement (SLA) metrics reports by 70%.

work.title: Mentor
work.description: Helped people to learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and SQL.

resume.skillmessage: Below I list the skills that are mainly related to web programming. I'm also familiar with Java, Python, SQL, Swift, and Linux.

projects.title: MERN Climbing Route Review
projects.category: An review app built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

projects.title: Rock Climbing Gym Online Store
projects.category: E-Commerce website built with ASP.NET CORE

projects.title: Club Member Catelog
projects.category: A management wibsite for club member and event built with PHP

testimonials.text: Doris is an outstanding individual with a fantastic work ethic. During her time as a student, she demonstrated her ability to think outside the box on many occassions. I can't wait to see Doris' impact on the industry!
testimonials.user: Shaun McKinnon ( Senior Developer at Mintent )

testimonials.text: Doris (Kuei-Chin) is a strong business and technical analyst for financial services. She is a bright and thoughtful individual that understands concepts quickly and can deliver quality output. Doris is a quick-start resource that is able to take on a responsibility and see it through to the end. She is conscientious in her delivery, to understand the expectations and strives to deliver objectives. She has handled challenging tasks with ease and completeness. She has assisted on a number of projects during her term at BMO. She is a quality candidate for new grad positions.
testimonials.user: Craig Wyndowe ( Solution Architect at Adastra North America )

testimonials.text: Doris is a listener and a thinker in our C# lesson. She is so impressive because I remember she once asked a question which was exactly the following topic to be studied in one C# class. Her assignments are always perfectly completed. I am expecting her to be a very successful IT professional.
testimonials.user: Kevin Zhongkai Li ( Applications Developer at MCSD )

testimonials.text: Doris (Kuei-Chin) is one of the most hardworking students I have encountered during my studies at Georgian College. I can see her study and discuss with peers and teachers all the time. I think that's why she can get a very high academic record in the first year. She is also a good teammate for studying group. She is willing to share her knowledge with others and helping others. It is my honor to study with her.
testimonials.user: Kim Chang ( Senior Data Center Architect at Oracle )
